grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 鰓蓋【エラブタ】gill cover, operculum
kun reading compounds: 蓋開け【ふたあけ】opening, beginning, commencement
臭い物に蓋【くさいものにふた】looking the other way, hushing up a problem
給油口の蓋【きゅうゆこうのふた】petrol cap
覆う【おおう】to cover, to hide, to conceal, to wrap, to disguise
